<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quadruped](/Feats.aspx?ID=3342) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 63</row>

</column>

---

You were crafted in a form with four legs rather than two. Your Speed is 30 feet.

**Special** You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.
name: Quadruped
